title: Happy & Murphy
sinopse:
Hangyul has only been carrying credit cards (no cash) since her kidnapping when she was 6 years old. One day, Gyuh-lu, the adopted son of her birth mother appears and transfers her to his school and starts living with her at her houseâ€¦.?!

About how these two delinquents meet. Their life... is it meant to be fated...?

(Source: MangaUpdates)
